body_html:
Hi,
I did the same mistake once. I think that If you installed tensorflow using pip only (first part of installation guide), you need to install the fast protobuf 3.0.0b2 manually. But, if you installed from sources, you do not need this step. If you did it by fault, you will end up with this stupid segmentation fault error when importing TF.

body:
Hi,
I did the same mistake once. I think that If you installed tensorflow using pip only (first part of installation guide), you need to install the fast protobuf 3.0.0b2 manually. But, if you installed from sources, you do not need this step. If you did it by fault, you will end up with this stupid segmentation fault error when importing TF.
